extensionAttribute.description: This attribute displays the client name assigned to the computer in the LiveBackup server.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh if [ -f /Library/Application\ Support/Atempo/Livebackup/clientname ];then clientName=`/bin/cat /Library/Application\ Support/Atempo/Livebackup/clientname` echo "<result>$clientName</result>" else echo "<result>LiveBackup is not installed on this machine.</result>" fi
